## How to cite


Examples for how to cite the Hylleraas Software Platform:


BibTeX:
```bibtex
@misc{hsp,
    title = {Hylleraas Software Platform},
    howpublished = {https://gitlab.com/hylleraasplatform},
    year = {2025},
}
```


BibLaTeX:
```bibtex
@software{hsp,
  title = {Hylleraas Software Platform},
  url = {https://gitlab.com/hylleraasplatform},
  version = {0.1.0},
  date = {2025-14-3},
}
```
